message.content:
cs.DB, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the formalization and extraction of association rules, which is a common topic in the field of databases (cs.DB). The use of closed itemsets and minimal generators is a technique commonly used in data mining and machine learning (cs.AI), and the paper proposes new methods for lossless reduction and inference mechanisms. The exploration of the disjunctive search space is also related to the field of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the representation and extraction of frequent itemsets, which is a topic in machine learning and data mining (cs.LG), as well as the extraction of generalized association rules, which is related to information retrieval (cs.IR).
